briefTitle: Passive Immunity Trial for Our Nation to Treat COVID-19 in Hospitalized Adults

armGroups.label: pathogen reduced SARS-CoV-2 convalescent plasma
interventionNames: Biological: pathogen reduced SARS-CoV-2 convalescent plasma

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Age greater than or equal to 18 years
2. Currently hospitalized or in an emergency department with anticipated hospitalization
3. Symptoms of acute respiratory infection, defined as one or more of the following:

   1. Cough
   2. Chills, or a fever (greater than 37.5° C or 99.5° F)
   3. Shortness of breath, operationalized as a patient having any of the following:

   i. Subjective shortness of breath reported by a patient or surrogate. ii. Tachypnea with respiratory rate of greater than 22 breaths per minute iii. Hypoxemia, defined as SpO2 less than 92% on room air, new receipt of supplemental oxygen to maintain SpO2 greater than or equal to 92%, or increased supplemental oxygen to maintain SpO2 greater than or equal to 92% for a patient on chronic oxygen therapy
4. Laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection within the past 14 days

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Prisoner
2. Unable to randomize within 14 days after onset of acute respiratory infection symptoms
3. Patient, legal representative, or physician not committed to full support (Exception: a patient who will receive all supportive care except for attempts at resuscitation from cardiac arrest will not be excluded.)
4. Inability to be contacted on Day 29-36 for clinical outcome assessment
5. Receipt of any SARS-CoV-2 passive immunity therapy, such as convalescent plasma, monoclonal antibodies, or pooled immunoglobulin, in the past 30 days
6. Contraindications to transfusion or history of prior reactions to transfused blood products
7. Plan for hospital discharge within 24 hours of enrollment
8. Previous enrollment in this trial
9. Previous laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 infection before the current illness
10. Enrollment in another clinical trial evaluating monoclonal antibodies, convalescent plasma, or another passive immunity therapy
11. Prior receipt of SARS-CoV-2 vaccine

outcomeMeasures.title: COVID-19 7-point Ordinal Clinical Progression Outcomes Scale Score
outcomeMeasures.description:
Outcome measured clinical status of the participant defined by the Covid-19 7-point Ordinal Clinical Progression Outcomes Scale: This scale reflects a range from baseline to death as follows:

1. Not hospitalized with resumption of normal activities.
2. Not hospitalized, but unable to resume normal activities.
3. Hospitalized, not on supplemental oxygen.
4. Hospitalized, on supplemental oxygen.
5. Hospitalized, on nasal high-flow oxygen therapy, noninvasive mechanical ventilation, or both
6. Hospitalized, on ECMO, invasive mechanical ventilation, or both.
7. Death

outcomeMeasures.title: All-location, All-cause 14-day Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: All-location, all-cause 14-day mortality; mortality was assessed via EHR review, phone call, social media review

outcomeMeasures.title: All-location, All-cause 28-day Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: All-location, all-cause 28-day mortality

outcomeMeasures.title: Survival Through 28 Days
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants survived through Day 28

outcomeMeasures.title: Oxygen-free Days Through Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days without use of oxygen

outcomeMeasures.title: Ventilator-free Days Through Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days without use of a ventilator

outcomeMeasures.title: Vasopressor-free Days Through Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days without use of vasopressors

outcomeMeasures.title: ICU-free Days Through Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days outside of ICU

outcomeMeasures.title: Hospital-free Days Through Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days outside of the hospital

outcomeMeasures.title: Acute Kidney Injury
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with Acute kidney injury

outcomeMeasures.title: Renal Replacement Therapy
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants requiring renal replacement therapy

outcomeMeasures.title: Documented Venous Thromboembolic Disease (DVT or PE)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with documented venous thromboembolic disease (DVT or PE)

outcomeMeasures.title: Documented Cardiovascular Event (Myocardial Infarction or Ischemic Stroke)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants with myocardial infarction or ischemic stroke

outcomeMeasures.title: Transfusion Reaction
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with transfusion reaction (fever/rash)

outcomeMeasures.title: Transfusion Related Acute Lung Injury (TRALI)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants with transfusion related acute lung injury (TRALI)

outcomeMeasures.title: Transfusion Associated Circulatory Overload (TACO)
